Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, fantastic value, great location, silly breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Lauren W
Reviews.Content: title hotel 2 minute walk lido beach front 10 minute walk vaporetto pier takes venice hotel beautiful beautiful serve breakfast 730 10 soso hot food price highly highly recommend hotel dont expect ton amenities modern bed wasnt perfect shower wasnt perfectly clean experience exceeded expectations

HotelInfo.Name: Byron Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Marcantonio Bragadin 30 | Lido di Venezia, 30126 Venice, Italy
